name: Bonescythe Sabatons
tooltip:
Bonescythe SabatonsLevel 60

Rohan the Assassin at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Bonescythe Sabatons if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Sabatons, 12 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 3 Cured Rugged Hides, 2 Nexus Crystals and 25 gold pieces.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Sabatons
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 12
- Cured Rugged Hide x 3
- Nexus Crystal x 2
- Money:25
